item.title: Trump admin blocked from deporting Colorado suspect's family, lawyer blasts 'medieval' tactic

item.title: Republican, Democratic FCC commissioners stepping down this week
item.description: Two members of the Federal Communications Commission said Wednesday they plan to resign this week.
